attributes.action: Keep Special forces reward for being the best of the best
attributes.additional_details:
I was sadened to read the article on page 17 in Daily Star On Sunday dated 09/11/14.Troops Rolex perk gets the chop. Special forces crack soldiers,aircraw had been issued with timepieces as a reward for being the best of the best.In my personal opinion this shows a Intollerable lack of respect by the Ministry of Defence for our brave soldiers who serve in units like the SAS,furthermore this process will under mine moral.
I ask my E Petition be debated in the House of Commons at Westminster were I'm sure that all MPs will agree that this crazy cost cutting must be immediatly abandoned.Our specials services in Great Britain deserve better from the goverment.
